articles.title: Scientists Engineer E. Coli Bacteria to Generate Electricity - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Ever since 1911, when British mycologist Michael Cressé Potter noticed that brewer's yeast generated electricity, scientists have been trying to harness the power of microbial fuel cells.
